description: Set options on specific levels. Takes precedence over series options, but not node and link options.

children.name: borderColor
children.description: Can set borderColor on all nodes which lay on the same level.

children.description: Can set borderWidth on all nodes which lay on the same level.

children.name: color
children.description: Can set color on all nodes which lay on the same level.

children.name: colorByPoint
children.description: Can set colorByPoint on all nodes which lay on the same level.

children.name: dataLabels
children.description: Can set dataLabels on all points which lay on the same level.

children.name: level
children.description: Decides which level takes effect from the options set in the levels object.

children.name: linkOpacity
children.description: Can set linkOpacity on all points which lay on the same level.

children.name: states
children.description: Can set states on all nodes and points which lay on the same level.
